name: TRIBECCA_HOME_Knightsbridge_Rolled_Top_Tufted_Chesterfield_King_Headboard
reviews: We put our entire bedroom together from overstock, with items we already had we created our resting place :)
Beautiful headboard. Arrived quickly in perfect condition. Thrilled with headboard and transaction !
omg it is every every nice just as it look on the picture. I love it :) a lot i will keep shopping for this store for sure.

The headboard itself is pretty, but Overstock sent the wrong screws needed to attach the headboard to the frame. I've heard that this happens often with Overstock (happened to my friend a month before I bought this). My husband works overseas and didn't have time to go out searching and using trial and error to find the right screws before he left, so the headboard is currently zip tied to the bedframe. Get it together, overstock!
description:
Make a designer statement in your bedroom with this gorgeous tufted
headboard from Tribecca Home. This rolled-top upholstered headboard
is covered in stylish linen available in a variety of colors to
match your existing decor. This delightful addition to your master
suite is also padded, providing a comfortable prop for your back
when you want to sit up in bed. Size: KingColor: Beige linen, grey linen, dark grey linen, brown bonded
  leatherMaterials: Linen, MDF, bonded leatherDimensions (overall): 53 inches high x 84.25 inches wide x
  7.87 inches deepStyleModern, VintageMaterialLinen, MDFTypePadded, Tufted, UpholsteredFinishBeige Finish, Brown Finish, Grey FinishAssemblyAssembly RequiredColorBeige, Brown, GreyFurniture PatternSolidProduct FeaturesIncludes Hardware
